event_text: The Clan worked hard to gather plenty of fresh-kill, but woke up to find pawprints leading away from the fresh-kill pile, and missing prey.

m_c woke up in the middle of the night to a strange noise. No one else was awake, or so {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} thought, until seeing someone at the fresh-kill pile. Before m_c could realize {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} mistake, sharp canine teeth were at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} throat, ensuring the Clan wakes up to find {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nest empty, and the prey gone.
history_text: Lost a life to a fox.

event_text: m_c was taking some prey from the fresh-kill pile only to find a swarm of rats! In the midst of battle, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} called to r_c for help. Together they fought off the rats, but not without their losses.
history_text: Was killed by a swarm of rats, while defending the fresh-kill pile.
a swarm of rats, while defending the fresh-kill pile

event_text: m_c was taking some prey from the fresh-kill pile only to find a swarm of rats! In the midst of battle, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} called to r_c for help. Together they fought off the rats, but got injured in the process.
history_text: Was hurt while defending the fresh-kill pile from a swarm of rats.
Died from their wounds after defending the fresh-kill pile from a swarm of rats.
defending the fresh-kill pile from a swarm of rats

event_text: m_c was taking some prey from the fresh-kill pile only to find a swarm of rats! While m_c managed to fight off every last rat, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} got injured in the process.
